alert.note: Alert for Coastal Palm Beach County; Glades (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued June 04 at 4:34AM EDT until further notice by NWS Miami
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT THROUGH SUNDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues to be possible. * WHERE...All of South Florida. * WHEN...Through Sunday morning. * IMPACTS...Creeks and streams may rise out of their banks. Flooding may occur in poor drainage and urban areas. Low-water crossings may be flooded. Storm drains and ditches may become clogged with debris. Extensive street flooding and flooding of creeks and rivers are possible. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Several rounds of heavy rain associated with PTC One will result in widespread 6 to 10 inches of rain across south Florida with isolated higher amounts around 15 inches possible. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be alert for possible Flood Warnings. Those living in areas prone to flooding should be prepared to take action should flooding develop.
